summary: Create an aesthetic, minimalistic marketing website for the brand “Vandan” (sole proprietor), focused on Chaniya Choli offerings, with light pink + white color theme, updated About/Services/Process content, no Testimonials section, updated Contact details/placeholders, and an About section photo box placeholder for user-provided image.
architectural_notes: Theme direction change: use a light pink + white palette consistently across the site while maintaining minimalistic styling.
About section should include a dedicated image placeholder/box next to the text, intended for a user-supplied photo.
Theme update request: change overall colors to match Chaniya Choli-inspired palette (supersedes prior light pink + white preference if confirmed).
Photo/grid request: remove any colored text styling on/within all photo placeholders/images (avoid text color overlays on photos).

existing_features.title: Create a responsive, aesthetic, minimalistic marketing website layout suitable for a sole proprietor, using a consistent visual system (spacing, typography, and components) across all pages/sections.

Implement a simple single-page structure (or simple routes if already present in the template) with these sections: Hero (name + short value proposition), About, Services, Process/How it works, Testimonials (optional placeholder), and Contact (email + phone placeholders).

Add a minimal contact form UI (name, email, message) with client-side validation and a clear success/error state. If backend submission is not implemented, the UI must clearly indicate a non-submitting demo state without breaking.

Establish a distinct minimalistic theme (not blue/purple) and apply it consistently: warm neutral palette (off-white/cream background, charcoal text), refined typography pairing (serif for headings, sans for body), subtle borders, and generous whitespace.
Add a footer with sole proprietor business placeholders (business name, city/region, email, phone, and a short copyright line) and minimal social placeholders (optional).
Generate and include required static image assets for the site (logo mark and subtle background), stored under frontend/public/assets/generated, and use them in the UI.
Replace the site brand name text "Professional Services" with "Vandan" wherever it appears in the UI (at minimum: header logo lockup and footer brand block).
Update the About section content to use the user-provided About text (replace the existing About paragraphs).

Update the Services section so it only describes the user-provided offering: "Vandan provides Chaniya Choli for bridal and sometimes for sider too" (remove the current multi-card consulting services).
In the How It Works / Process section, update the "Delivery" step description to: "min 10 pcs of oder is available for delivery" (keeping the step title as "Delivery").
Remove the entire Client Testimonials section from the page, and remove any navigation link(s) that scroll to it.
Update contact details so the email is set to "vandan@gmail.com". Keep phone and location as clearly labeled placeholders for the user to fill in later (do not hardcode a phone number or location).
Add a new section that shows 12 color/photo placeholders (a simple 12-item grid) so the user can replace them later.

Update the fixed header (HeaderNav) to include an additional logo photo box positioned on the top-right corner of the header bar (to the right of the navigation on desktop, and accessible in the mobile header/menu), displayed as an image placeholder-style box that can later be replaced with a real logo image.

In the 12-item color/photo placeholder grid (ColorPlaceholdersSection), change the color styling of the text shown below each placeholder image (the label and the "[Photo to be added]" caption) to a new, clearer color treatment that differs from the current muted gray and remains readable in both light and dark themes.

Update the 12-item color/photo placeholder grid (ColorPlaceholdersSection) so that each placeholder item includes a text box/input field placed after (beneath) each photo/placeholder area to allow the user to type a custom label/notes for each photo.
Remove the "Connect" area from the site footer, including the "Connect" heading and all social icon/link placeholders shown under it.
Remove the brand/tagline content that appears above the footer Contact information so that "Vandan" and any "Delivering exceptional..."-style tagline text is not shown above the contact details.

Update the global website color theme to a minimal light pink + white palette, applied consistently across all sections and shared components (backgrounds, cards, borders, accents, buttons, and link/active states).

Modify the About section layout to include a photo placeholder box positioned beside the About Me content on desktop, and stacked appropriately on mobile; the placeholder must clearly indicate that the user will add the photo later.

Update the footer attribution/credit line to remove any “Built by love giggle.com” (or similar third-party credit) and replace it with a neutral Vandan-owned copyright line in English, without linking to any external website.

Update the global website color palette to be inspired by traditional Chaniya Choli colors (e.g., rich bridal tones such as deep red/maroon with complementary warm-gold/neutral accents), and apply the updated palette consistently across the entire site (backgrounds, cards, borders, accents, buttons, link/active states) using the existing CSS variable theme system.

Remove colored text styling from all photo/placeholder areas across the site so that any text shown inside photo placeholders stays neutral (foreground/muted) and does not switch to an accent/primary color on hover or interaction.

Implement a site-wide maintenance mode that effectively takes the website offline by rendering only a simple unavailable screen instead of the marketing content, and enable it by default so the current production site is taken down after deployment.

new_feature_requests.summary: Design and build an aesthetic, minimalistic website for a sole proprietor.

Update site content/branding to “Vandan”: replace “Professional Services”, update About/Services/How it works copy, remove Testimonials section, set contact email to vandan@gmail.com with phone/location placeholders, and add a 12-color photo placeholder section.
Update header/top-right area to include a logo photo box (image placeholder) positioned in the top-right corner.
Update the 12-photo placeholder grid so the text/caption color below each image is changed (to user-preferred color) and add a text box/input area after each photo.
Remove the "Connect" element/section ("connect one") from the site UI.
Remove the text content above the Contact section (e.g., "Vandan" and the "Delivering exceptional..." line/tagline).
Update the website color theme to light pink and white (minimalistic, consistent across sections/components).
Add an image/photo box placeholder beside the About section content (user will add the photo later).
Update/remove the footer credit text/link currently showing “Built by love giggle.com” (replace with appropriate Vandan footer credit or remove it).
Update site color palette to match Chaniya Choli colors, and remove text color/colored text from all photo areas (no text coloring on photos/placeholders).
Take down/unpublish the live production website (stop the live deployment).
